arts.ttl: Barcelona, Liverpool Target Better Suited to Play in Ligue 1 Amid PSG Transfer Rumors
arts.sum: Barcelona, Liverpool, Manchester United, and Paris Saint-Germain are reportedly keeping a close eye on Napoli’s Khvicha Kvaratskhelia. Talks over a contract extension between the Georgian winger and Napoli appear to have stalled, which could benefit these interested clubs. arts.ttl: Juventus Broadens Defensive Target Search Amid Interest in PSG Outcast
arts.sum: Milan Škriniar has shifted to a backup role at Paris Saint-Germain, with manager Luis Enrique favoring Willian Pacho and Marquinhos as his starting center-backs. As a result, the veteran defender could be on his way out in the coming weeks. During the summer, Škriniar was linked to several clubs but opted to stay at PSG. arts.ttl: PSG held to 1-1 draw at home by Nantes
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain were held to a rare 1-1 home draw against underdogs Nantes in a Ligue 1 clash on Saturday.

arts.ttl: PSG Set to Challenge AC Milan for €12M-Rated Club Brugge Standout
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain need left-back depth behind Nuno Mendes, and sporting advisor Luis Campos could look to Belgium to find a player who can compete with Mendes or, at the very least, spell him rest. In recent weeks, Theo Hernández’s future at AC Milan remains uncertain as contract extension talks have reached a standstill. arts.sum: Although pressure continues to mount on Luis Enrique’s side amid their continental debacle this autumn, Paris Saint-Germain have remained unopposed in their Ligue 1 title defence. Saturday night’s reception of…

arts.ttl: PSG Willing to Propose Player Swap to Chelsea for Man Utd Transfer Target
arts.sum: Christopher Nkunku has attracted interest from Manchester United and Paris Saint-Germain, with reports suggesting his time at Chelsea, who signed him for £52 million in 2023, could end. However, these two clubs aren’t the only ones eyeing the 27-year-old. arts.ttl: Watch Achraf Hakimi Score Lightning-Fast Goal for PSG Against Nantes
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain didn’t take long to find the back of the net as Achraf Hakimi scored two minutes into the contest to give the home side an early lead. After the midweek loss to Bayern Munich, it would be ideal for Luis Enrique to secure a win to build positive momentum. arts.ttl: Man Utd Willing to Sell €60M-Rated PSG Target Not Fitting Squad Philosophy
arts.sum: With Ruben Amorim now in charge, Marcus Rashford’s future at Manchester United could be decided during the 2024-25 season. Despite ongoing transfer rumors, a former Manchester United coach believes the England forward shouldn’t be sold. Last month, TEAMtalk reported that Paris Saint-Germain have revived their interest in Rashford. arts.ttl: Man Utd Could Spend £249.3M on Three PSG-Linked Players in Transfers
arts.sum: Manchester United are pursuing three players that have been on Paris Saint-Germain’s transfer radar over the last few months.
